Generated Narrative: CodeSystem IMMZ.D5.DT.Inputs

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeTypeDescription
tabletablestringContraindication Table ID

Concepts

This case-insensitive code system http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D5.DT.Inputs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitiontable
tchhosar-51.63 The client has history of severe allergic reactions"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"IMMZ.D5.DT.Meningococcal contraindications, IMMZ.D5.DT.Rabies contraindications, IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tcicp-32.56 The client is currently pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant"IMMZ.D5.DT.Hepatitis A contraindications, IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tcisi-40.64 The client is severely immunocompromised"Potential contraindications" = "Severely immunocompromised"IMMZ.D5.DT.Hepatitis A contraindications, IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tchahosar-53.64 The client has a history of severe allergic reactions'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"IMMZ.D5.DT.Hepatitis A contraindications
tcii-31.55 The client is immunocompromised"Potential contraindications" = "Immunocompromised"IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tcicl-33.52 The client is currently lactating'"Potential contraindications" = "Breastfeeding"IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tchhoar-48.70 The client has history of anaphylactic reactions"Potential contraindications" ="History of anaphylactic reactions"IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tchis-41.64 The client has immunodeficiency syndromes"Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes"IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tcisi-39.63 The client is severely immunosuppressed"Potential contraindications" = "Severely immunosuppressed"IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tchshi-40.63 The client has symptomatic HIV infection"Potential contraindications" = "Symptomatic HIV infection"IMMZ.D5.DT.Dengue contraindications
tchhtaotvc-64.72 The client has hypersensitivity to any of the vaccine components"Potential contraindications" = "Hypersensitivity to vaccine components"IMMZ.D5.DT.Malaria contraindications
tcicp-32.52 The client is currently pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant"IMMZ.D5.DT.Mumps contraindications, IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicella contraindications
tchatvc-44.60 The client has allergy to vaccine components'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"IMMZ.D5.DT.Mumps contraindications
tchid-32.60 The client has immune deficiency"Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes"IMMZ.D5.DT.Mumps contraindications, IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicella contraindications
tcisi-39.59 The client is severely immunosuppressed"Potential contraindications" = "Severely immunosuppressed"IMMZ.D5.DT.Mumps contraindications
tchahoar-50.67 The client has a history of anaphylactic reactions"Potential contraindications" = "History of anaphylactic reactions"IMMZ.D5.DT.Seasonal influenza contraindications
tchahosaraapdotavc-101.59 The client has a history of severe allergic reactions after a previous dose or to a vaccine component"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"IMMZ.D5.DT.Seasonal influenza contraindications
tciptgpitnm-56.76 The client is planning to get pregnant in the next month"Potential contraindications" = "Planning to get pregnant in the next month"IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicella contraindications
tcii-31.51 The client is immunocompromised"Potential contraindications" = "Immunocompromised"IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicella contraindications
tcirohrmtmbi-81.72 The client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive"Potential contraindications" = "Exposed to immunosuppressive treatment"IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicella contraindications
